roleset.name: to happen
roleset.note: BEFALL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'befall' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from befall.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The specific scene [0] he mentions [*T*-3]in which pet dogs are crushed [*-1] [*T*-4] is somewhat reminiscent of the continual plights that [*T*-2] befall the coyote in the old Warner Bros . `` Road Runner '' cartoons .
example.arg: in the old Warner Bros . `` Road Runner '' cartoons
